mapper.update: update book set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isbn = #{isbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publisher = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publish_year = #{publishYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, binding = #{binding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_date = #{addDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, douban_id = #{doubanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, isbn, publisher, author, publish_year, binding, price, add_date, douban_id from book where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, name, isbn, publisher, author, publish_year, binding, price, add_date, douban_id from book
